channel.title: Multilevel Regression on Nathaniel Hendrix
channel.description: Recent content in Multilevel Regression on Nathaniel Hendrix

item.title: Replicating the eight schools example in brms
item.description: Iâ€™ve wanted to learn to use Bayesian hierarchical modeling for a long time, but the learning curve of working directly with JAGS and STAN has kept me from diving in more deeply. I randomly learned about brms recently and wanted to try it out, since it provides an easy interface to STAN When I read Bayesian Data Analysis, I spent the most time with the eight schools example because it matched the structure of some data I was interested in analyzing.
